name: 最后一回合 The Last Round
name_original: 最后一回合 The Last Round
description:
It was my first indie game.
It is a pixel-style puzzle game, It is similar to Into the Breach.

You will control several units in a NXN battlefield, using terrain, positioning, special abilities to attack the enemy, protect the crystal, the final victory.
You can also customize levels, upload your level, or challenge someone else's.
The game progresses in levels, each with a different terrain and enemies that require a lot of thought.

Key Features

  • Custom levels: Edit and upload your levels and challenge others' levels.
  • Custom units: Each unit has nearly 10 attributes that can be adjusted.
  • Rich terrain: Nearly 30 types of terrain, combined into a rich strategy.
  • Rich Settings: You can pan an entire area, trigger enemy units to attack first, set nearby units on fire through collisions, and a variety of Settings
Other [/]
Some of the resources come from resource stores and are authorized.
